This vignette compare `tricky`'s `set_standard_names()` function to `tibble`'s `set_tidy_names()`. 

```{r setup}
library("tibble")
library("tricky")
table_sample <- tibble(
  `base élèves` = c("toto"), 
  `2017/07/07` = as.Date("2017-07-01")
  )
```

```{r}
table_sample %>% 
  set_standard_names()
```

```{r}
table_sample %>% 
  set_tidy_names(syntactic = TRUE)
```
